Influenza Updates:

  • Laboratory-confirmed flu activity Link: https://www.cdc.gov/flu/weekly/index.htm is low at this time.
  • A COVID-19 pandemic Link: https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/cases-updates/index.html is ongoing.

CDC Recommends:

  • See CDC guidance Link: https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/prevent-getting-sick/prevention.html on how to protect yourself & others from COVID-19.
